src:
Sara Ali Khan accuses 'Coolie No. 1' co-star Varun Dhawan of stealing her captions
05 Nov 2019, 10:15 by TIMESOFINDIA.COM
Varun Dhawan and Sara Ali Khan are all set to come together for the first time on the silver screen in David Dhawan's 'Coolie No. 1' which is a remake of 1995 hit film with the same name.
While several pictures from the sets have made their way on the internet, Sara had taken to social media earlier in the day to share an adorable picture with Varun and captioned it as "Cool and Coolie💁🏻‍♀️🙆🏽‍♂️🧳👜👫🌈"



Now, Varun has shared the same picture by giving Sara's caption a twist of his own. He wrote, "He’s a COOL 😎ie बहुत काम कराती हैं yeh Sara Ra" and this caught the attention of the young starlet who instantly commented on the picture accusing Varun of stealing her captions.



The film which also features Paresh Rawal and Sahil Vaid in significant roles is slated to release on 1 May 2020. While the original one featured Govinda and Karisma Kapoor in the lead role, Varun and Sara's camaraderie on social media a delight for all their fans.
